title: VILLAGE / LITTLE LILY
description: One of Netpicker's kids not running around in the village, instead she sits on the sofa. You can exchange a few words with her.

dialogueTree.title: Little Lily: ""Uh, mister, what were you doing in..."
dialogueTree.text: "Uh, mister, what were you doing in my fireplace?"

links.title: You: ""There was a phasmid in it! I was t..."
links.text: "There was a phasmid in it! I was trying to catch it."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Ohh, okay!" She nods seriously."
links.text: "Ohh, okay!" She nods seriously.

links.title: You: ""Nothing.""
links.text: "Nothing."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Ohh, okay!" She twirls her fuzzy b..."
links.text: "Ohh, okay!" She twirls her fuzzy beast in the air.

dialogueTree.title: Little Lily: ""Hello, mister!" The Net Picker's d..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello, mister!" The Net Picker's daughter waves at you.

links.title: You: ""I'm talking to the children to lea..."
links.text: "I'm talking to the children to learn from them. Has anything strange happened here lately?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Uhhhhh..." She sits her doll on he..."
links.text: "Uhhhhh..." She sits her doll on her lap. Its ragged limbs reach out toward you, as if longing for a cuddle. "Like what?"

links.title: You: ""Anything. Maybe something you saw..."
links.text: "Anything. Maybe something you saw or heard that was weird?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Yes!" She lights with recognition...."
links.text: "Yes!" She lights with recognition. "The twins got in trouble for saying *bad words*."

links.title: You: ""Is that it?""
links.text: "Is that it?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Yes." She yawns, and leans back in..."
links.text: "Yes." She yawns, and leans back into the cushion.

links.title: You: ""What's wrong with bad words? I lov..."
links.text: "What's wrong with bad words? I love bad words."

links.title: Little Lily: "She gasps. "No! Don't say bad words..."
links.text: She gasps. "No! Don't say bad words! Promise?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll keep an eye on him." The lieu..."
links.text: "I'll keep an eye on him." The lieutenant cuts in faster than you can reply. "Don't worry."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He's not going to let you make a fo..."
links.text: He's not going to let you make a fool of yourself or the RCM in front of this girl. Not while he's here.

links.title: You: ""But bad words can be good! It can..."
links.text: "But bad words can be good! It can be healthy to express yourself with them."

links.title: Little Lily: ""What?" She covers Lamby's ears by..."
links.text: "What?" She covers Lamby's ears by cupping his whole head in her small palms.

links.title: Little Lily: ""Lamby doesn't like bad words. Plea..."
links.text: "Lamby doesn't like bad words. Please promise!"

links.title: You: ""No can do. I got a potty mouth til..."
links.text: "No can do. I got a potty mouth till I die."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Nooooo! Don't be bad too!" Her fac..."
links.text: "Nooooo! Don't be bad too!" Her face bunches up in a scowl.

links.title: Volition: "Guess you held your ground. It can..."
links.text: Guess you held your ground. It can be good, being honest with yourself.

links.title: You: ""Okay." (Lie.)"
links.text: "Okay." (Lie.)

links.title: Little Lily: ""Good." She hugs Lamby close to her..."
links.text: "Good." She hugs Lamby close to her again.

links.title: Volition: "Was it good to lie to a child? Mayb..."
links.text: Was it good to lie to a child? Maybe it doesn't matter. It's not your responsibility.

links.title: You: "Hey, why can't I swear off swearing..."
links.text: Hey, why can't I swear off swearing for real?

links.title: Little Lily: "She stares at you, waiting for an a..."
links.text: She stares at you, waiting for an answer.

links.title: Volition: "You can't abandon swearing for a si..."
links.text: You can't abandon swearing for a simple reason: You're just a man who swears.

links.title: You: "But what if I don't want to be a ma..."
links.text: But what if I don't want to be a man who swears? What if I want to be a No-Bad-Word Cop?

links.title: Volition: "Because it's just not you. I'm sorr..."
links.text: Because it's just not you. I'm sorry.

links.title: You: "I won't swear! I just won't! I'll j..."
links.text: I won't swear! I just won't! I'll just go quiet, you watch!

links.title: Volition: "Please, don't make this more diffic..."
links.text: Please, don't make this more difficult for yourself. It's okay to swear. It can be healthy, even.

links.title: Volition: "..."
You: "... Fuck. I guess I am a man who sw..."
links.text: ... Fuck. I guess I am a man who swears.

links.title: Volition: "Yes. There you are."
links.text: Yes. There you are.

links.title: Little Lily: "It has only lasted three seconds. T..."
links.text: It has only lasted three seconds. The girl still waits for her answer.

links.title: You: "What? No clever answers from the bo..."
links.text: What? No clever answers from the body and brain? Nothing?

links.title: Little Lily: "The little girl tilts her head. "Do..."
links.text: The little girl tilts her head. "Do you promise you won't say bad words anymore?"

links.title: You: ""Bad words are for losers. Good on..."
links.text: "Bad words are for losers. Good on you for not saying them."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Yep!" The girl nods firmly. "I don..."
links.text: "Yep!" The girl nods firmly. "I don't say bad words. Lamby doesn't either."

links.title: Half Light: "FUCK OFF."
links.text: FUCK OFF.

links.title: Little Lily: "Lamby remains silent. The fireplace..."
links.text: Lamby remains silent. The fireplace flickers and cackles. She hugs the doll close to her chest and laughs.

links.title: You: ""I see. Thank you for the tip; I'll..."
links.text: "I see. Thank you for the tip; I'll talk to them about it." (Move on.)

links.title: Little Lily: ""You're welcome!""
links.text: "You're welcome!"

links.title: You: ""Anything that will help me dismant..."
links.text: "Anything that will help me dismantle Capitalism, so that you can inherit Communism, O' Girl Child Revolution?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Cap-capi-capeel..." She struggles..."
links.text: "Cap-capi-capeel..." She struggles to pronounce the words. She shakes her head. "No."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs, and kneels to..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs, and kneels to be eye-level with the girl. "Maybe someone you know has acted a little different, lately?"

links.title: You: ""Poor Girl Child Revolution. What h..."
links.text: "Poor Girl Child Revolution. What have the bourgeois done to you?"

links.title: Little Lily: "She turns the stuffed lamb to face..."
links.text: She turns the stuffed lamb to face her. "What does that mean, Lamby?" The doll offers no reply. Stuffing hangs out its rear.

links.title: You: ""Never mind. Have you just seen or..."
links.text: "Never mind. Have you just seen or heard anything weird lately?"

links.title: You: ""I heard you kids might have gotten..."
links.text: "I heard you kids might have gotten into the Feld building?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Noo, mister!" Her eyes grow wider..."
links.text: "Noo, mister!" Her eyes grow wider as she shakes her head. "Even Lamby doesn't like it." She hugs her stuffed toy tighter.

links.title: Little Lily: ""We don't go there. Mom and auntie..."
links.text: "We don't go there. Mom and auntie think we do, but it's very booky."

links.title: You: ""Wait, you mean spooky, right?""
links.text: "Wait, you mean spooky, right?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Mhmh," she replies, nodding. "It's..."
links.text: "Mhmh," she replies, nodding. "It's very, very booky."

links.title: You: ""Why is it 'booky'?""
links.text: "Why is it 'booky'?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Vee-eery booky!" She's clutching h..."
links.text: "Vee-eery booky!" She's clutching her stuffed toy and shaking her head. "Don't go there."

links.title: You: ""Is there anything you can tell me..."
links.text: "Is there anything you can tell me about the building?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""It's old and broken." She nods. "D..."
links.text: "It's old and broken." She nods. "Dan-ze-ruus, Mom says. I listen to mom. Lamby also listens. Brothers listen. They tried going there, but it was scary and they ran away!"

links.title: You: ""I heard there was a girl here who..."
links.text: "I heard there was a girl here who has armoured gloves. Is that you?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Ooooh." She looks alarmed. "I had..."
links.text: "Ooooh." She looks alarmed. "I had gloves, very big ones! Heavy too."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Where did you get these gloves?""
links.text: "Where did you get these gloves?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Found them when Lamby and I were p..."
links.text: "Found them when Lamby and I were playing hide-and-seek. In an empty house where no one lives! I think someone hid them there..."

links.title: Empathy: "She doesn't want you to think she s..."
links.text: She doesn't want you to think she stole them.

links.title: You: ""And where are the gloves now?""
links.text: "And where are the gloves now?"

links.title: Little Lily: "She pouts. "I hid them. The twins w..."
links.text: She pouts. "I hid them. The twins were going to take them. They're stupid..." She lifts her stuffed toy up and looks into its one remaining eye, as though searching for confirmation.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're going to need those gloves...."
links.text: "We're going to need those gloves. It's for important police business." He enunciates the last two words carefully.

links.title: Little Lily: ""Oooh..." She doesn't seem to under..."
links.text: "Oooh..." She doesn't seem to understand, but the lieutenant's tone has conveyed to her the 'important' part.

links.title: Little Lily: ""They're in my sandcastle." She poi..."
links.text: "They're in my sandcastle." She points somewhere outside. "Behind our house. Under the sand. You can break the castle, it's not very good."

links.title: You: ""I need those gloves.""
links.text: "I need those gloves."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Why?" She looks at you suspiciousl..."
links.text: "Why?" She looks at you suspiciously.

links.title: You: ""I need them for a very important p..."
links.text: "I need them for a very important police investigation."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Oooh..." She doesn't seem to under..."
links.text: "Oooh..." She doesn't seem to understand, but you have conveyed the 'important' part, at least.

links.title: You: ""It's grown-up business. You wouldn..."
links.text: "It's grown-up business. You wouldn't understand. Just tell me where they are."

links.title: Little Lily: "She frowns, delaying divulging her..."
links.text: She frowns, delaying divulging her secret. "Oo-kay," she says finally with some reluctance. "I hid them inside my sandcastle. Behind the house." She points somewhere outside. "You can take them."

links.title: You: ""Where did you get them?""
links.text: "Where did you get them?"

links.title: You: ""Do you know anyone named Ruby?""
links.text: "Do you know anyone named Ruby?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Ll... Luby... Rr... R-luuby." Sudd..."
links.text: "Ll... Luby... Rr... R-luuby." Suddenly the girl gets all serious and leans in, as if she's about to tell you a secret.

links.title: Little Lily: ""My mom tells me that I'm a big gir..."
links.text: "My mom tells me that I'm a big girl, but she doesn't know that I can't say *ll*. Or like, sometimes I can, but then... *ll*... *rr*... *llrr*..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Kids." The lieutenant shakes his h..."
links.text: "Kids." The lieutenant shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""Where are your parents?""
links.text: "Where are your parents?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""My mom's outside, and I don't real..."
links.text: "My mom's outside, and I don't really know about my dad." She gives you a bright smile like it's a good thing.

links.title: You: ""Are you Lilienne's daughter?""
links.text: "Are you Lilienne's daughter?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Yesssss, I am! Little Lily!" She g..."
links.text: "Yesssss, I am! Little Lily!" She gazes at you with her big eyes. "You know my mom?"

links.title: You: ""Yes, we met earlier.""
links.text: "Yes, we met earlier."

links.title: Little Lily: ""That's nice! My mom is great," she..."
links.text: "That's nice! My mom is great," she nods. "She's never angry or anything."

links.title: You: ""Not really, but I'd like to.""
links.text: "Not really, but I'd like to."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Uh huh," she nods. "Mom is great!..."
links.text: "Uh huh," she nods. "Mom is great! You know what's great about my mom?"

links.title: You: ""Everything?""
links.text: "Everything?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Haa haa, yessss!" She smiles, hugg..."
links.text: "Haa haa, yessss!" She smiles, hugging her fuzzy toy.

links.title: You: ""No, do tell me.""
links.text: "No, do tell me."

links.title: Little Lily: ""*Everything*!" She shouts with gle..."
links.text: "*Everything*!" She shouts with glee.

links.title: You: ""Are the twins outside your brother..."
links.text: "Are the twins outside your brothers?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Yesss." She frowns. "They don't wa..."
links.text: "Yesss." She frowns. "They don't want to play with me. They're older and play outside!"

links.title: Little Lily: ""They look the same! Haa ha haa! So..."
links.text: "They look the same! Haa ha haa! Sometimes I can't tell them 'part."

links.title: You: ""They look identical, right? I said..."
links.text: "They look identical, right? I said the same thing."

links.title: Little Lily: ""They look... ai-dent-ik!" She slow..."
links.text: "They look... ai-dent-ik!" She slowly processes the word, then snickers with laughter.

links.title: You: ""I guess they do look alike.""
links.text: "I guess they do look alike."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Haa ha haa!" She continues laughin..."
links.text: "Haa ha haa!" She continues laughing. "Lamby tells them part." She waves her fuzzy doll in the air.

links.title: You: ""What's this?" (Show her the stuffe..."
links.text: "What's this?" (Show her the stuffed bird you took from the ceiling.)

links.title: Little Lily: ""It's a *grouse*," she yelps, smili..."
links.text: "It's a *grouse*," she yelps, smiling broadly.

links.title: Suggestion: "You might be able to get on Garte's..."
links.text: You might be able to get on Garte's good side if you make up for the skua you broke?

links.title: You: ""Yes, but what's it *for*?""
links.text: "Yes, but what's it *for*?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""I dunno.""
links.text: "I dunno."

links.title: You: ""Can I have it? I know someone who..."
links.text: "Can I have it? I know someone who really likes stuffed birds."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Sure! I mean you already took it...."
links.text: "Sure! I mean you already took it. I don't like it anyway... it looks angry."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Sure! Just go and get it. I don't..."
links.text: "Sure! Just go and get it. I don't like it anyway... it looks angry."

links.title: You: ""Well, can I have it?""
links.text: "Well, can I have it?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Sure! I mean you already took it...."
links.text: "Sure! I mean you already took it. I don't like it anyway... it looks angry."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Sure! Just go and get it. I don't..."
links.text: "Sure! Just go and get it. I don't like it anyway... it looks angry."

links.title: You: ""Uh, okay, thanks.""
links.text: "Uh, okay, thanks."

links.title: Little Lily: "She twirls the furry doll around in..."
links.text: She twirls the furry doll around in the air, giggling happily.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "All right. You just need to grab it..."
links.text: All right. You just need to grab it from the ceiling and go!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wasn't Garte, the cafeteria manager..."
links.text: Wasn't Garte, the cafeteria manager, trying to repair a piece of taxidermy?

links.title: Suggestion: "You might be able to get on Garte's..."
links.text: You might be able to get on Garte's good side if you replace the broken skua you almost certainly broke?

links.title: You: ""What's that?" (Point at the stuffe..."
links.text: "What's that?" (Point at the stuffed bird hanging from the ceiling.)

links.title: You: ""What's that thing you're holding?"..."
links.text: "What's that thing you're holding?" (Point at her toy.)

links.title: Little Lily: ""It's Lamby! He's my friend. Sort o..."
links.text: "It's Lamby! He's my friend. Sort of, like..." She holds the fuzzy beast up to demonstrate.

links.title: Little Lily: "Lamby is a stuffed lamb that, admit..."
links.text: Lamby is a stuffed lamb that, admittedly, has seen better days. One of the eye-buttons is missing and the fur is tattered in several parts.

links.title: You: ""Lamby looks like he's falling apar..."
links.text: "Lamby looks like he's falling apart."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Yessss, Lamby has lived a long lif..."
links.text: "Yessss, Lamby has lived a long life." She waves the lamb around in the air. "Lamby was a... re.. a rev..." She stumbles on her words.

links.title: You: ""Revanchist?""
links.text: "Revanchist?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Noo-noooo, that's not it." She fro..."
links.text: "Noo-noooo, that's not it." She frowns, looking at her tattered toy. "You know what you are, Lamby."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think she means 'revolutionary'.""
links.text: "I think she means 'revolutionary'."

links.title: You: ""Revolutionary?""
links.text: "Revolutionary?"

links.title: Little Lily: ""Yessss," she yelps happily! "Lamby..."
links.text: "Yessss," she yelps happily! "Lamby was a re-luz-ion...ry."

links.title: You: ""Revacholian?""
links.text: "Revacholian?"

links.title: You: ""Remote Viewer?""
links.text: "Remote Viewer?"

links.title: You: ""Revisionist?""
links.text: "Revisionist?"

links.title: You: ""Rebel?""
links.text: "Rebel?"

links.title: You: ""Lamby looks soft.""
links.text: "Lamby looks soft."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Yes. Very soft." Suddenly she push..."
links.text: "Yes. Very soft." Suddenly she pushes the stuffed animal toward your face.

links.title: You: "Press your cheek against Lamby."
links.text: Press your cheek against Lamby.

links.title: Little Lily: ""Isn't he soft?" She's right, Lamby..."
links.text: "Isn't he soft?" She's right, Lamby is very soft. She rubs the white fur against your cheek, then returns the lamb into her lap, cuddling it.

links.title: You: ""I don't deserve it. I'm scum.""
links.text: "I don't deserve it. I'm scum."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Press your damn cheek against Lamb..."
links.text: "Press your damn cheek against Lamby, okay?" The lieutenant sounds authoritative -- and surprisingly gruff.

links.title: Little Lily: ""Okay, then. I'm sorry." She presse..."
links.text: "Okay, then. I'm sorry." She presses her own cheek against Lamby and smiles, sadly.

links.title: You: ""Oh, okay. Well, pleased to meet yo..."
links.text: "Oh, okay. Well, pleased to meet you, Lamby."

links.title: Little Lily: ""Lamby usually doesn't like strange..."
links.text: "Lamby usually doesn't like strangers, but you're also fuzzy like Lamby."

links.title: You: ""Good-bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Good-bye." [Leave.]

links.title: Little Lily: ""Bye!" The girl's large, curious ey..."
links.text: "Bye!" The girl's large, curious eyes remain fixed on you.

dialogueTree.title: Little Lily: ""Hello, mister!" A young girl, bare..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello, mister!" A young girl, barely four or five years old, sits on the sofa. She is looking at you with frank curiosity.

links.title: Little Lily: "She clutches a small stuffed animal..."
links.text: She clutches a small stuffed animal. Occasionally she twirls it around.
